name: Wedding Wars
description:
Wedding Wars is a fun and wacky action multiplayer game with a twist of love. Mount flying pet and stomp opponents for the license to wed!

Can you protect each other and march to the wedding altar?

Current available game modes

  • Headhunters mode In this mode, player will gain point if he defeat another player.
  • Last Man Standing mode In this mode, player will gain a point if he/she is the last man standing.
  • Team Deathmatch mode In this mode, player will pick to be a red team or blue team.
